detail_desc: Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a slit and covered buttons at the cuffs, and a curved hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a slit and covered buttons at the cuffs, and a curved hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a sewn-in wrapover and pleats, and a flared peplum.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, chest pockets, and patch front pockets with a button. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, chest pockets, and patch front pockets with a button. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, chest pockets, and patch front pockets with a button. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.

Tunic in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, a gathered yoke at the back and open chest pockets. Long, gathered sleeves, wide cuffs with press-studs, a seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft denim with a small stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Decorative pocket flaps with a press-stud at the top, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.

Boots in sturdy cotton canvas with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Platform front 4.5 cm, heel 6 cm.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Dungarees in cotton twill with adjustable straps. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and straight legs with seams at the knees.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves,wide ties under the bust and slits in the sides.

Tunic in airy, patterned jersey with a frilled collar and a small V-neck with a button at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs and a narrow tie belt under the bust. The polyester content of the tunic is recycled.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in jersey under a layer of sequined mesh. High, elasticated waist and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details. Wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back, and a zip at the hems.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft, gently draping fabric with an opening down the back, button at the back of the neck, and short, flared sleeves. Elasticated seam and a tie belt under the bust, and straight, wide legs.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft, gently draping fabric with an opening down the back, button at the back of the neck, and short, flared sleeves. Elasticated seam and a tie belt under the bust, and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft, patterned modal jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Short, fitted dress in velour with a V-neck, draping with a knot detail at the front and long sleeves.

Dress in patterned chiffon with decorative gathers at the neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt that has an extra layer at the front and is longer at the back. Jersey lining.

Earrings in plastic and metal in various designs, one pair with a pearly plastic bead. Length 2.5 cm to 4.5 cm.
Dress in a soft, denim-look Tencel™ lyocell weave with narrow elastication around the wide neckline, flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Leggings in glittery jersey with a wide, foldover waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Small shoulder bag made from recycled plastic beads with a metal chain shoulder strap. No fastener. Size 1x10x10.5 cm.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in sturdy organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a glittery print on the front, vertical seam at the back and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Short-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and tie. Shirt in poplin made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Waistcoat in a cotton and linen weave with fake front pockets and buttons down the front. Tie in twill with a slight sheen.
Top in a supersoft fine knit with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves.
Long hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6.2 cm.
Socks in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a knee-high shaft and ribbing at the top.
Metal earrings with a rectangular plate at the top and a rod and hoop-shaped pendant. Length 5.7 cm.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
